The British School of Guangzhou

Dear Parents, As part of our commitment to provide opportunities for parents to be fully involved in school life we are organising a meeting on Wednesday 12th March from 10am-11am for the lower school parents. If you are available at this time we urge you to come along and volunteer your services to support Early Years and Key Stage 1 children. This will also be an opportunity to update you on important developments for the forthcoming academic year including:
Development of outdoor learning (Miss Helen) Update on the new KS1 building (Mr. Cunliffe) TA recruitment for next year (Mr. Thomas) German home language opportunities (Mr. Thomas) Additional support for Korean families (Mr. Thomas with support from our Korean Parent representative Miss Rachel)
Please note that if you are unable to come along for this meeting we will be providing a written update on all these initiatives on the website and through newsletters. We will also be arranging similar meetings with Primary and Secondary parents in due course. Regards, Mr. Mark Thomas Principal The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
